## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                   | Type                         | Default        |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------- | -------------- |
| `alignment` | `alignment` | The alignment of the separator. Per default it is horizontal. | `"horizontal" \| "vertical"` | `'horizontal'` |
